thread.title: Paddy Power Betfair in discussions to buy FanDuel

title: Paddy Power Betfair in discussions to buy FanDuel
text:
Paddy Power Betfair in discussions to buy FanDuel 7:46pm IST - 01:41
Paddy Power Betfair is considering merging its U.S. business with fantasy sports company FanDuel to target the U.S. sports betting market, the Irish bookmaker said on Wednesday. As Kate King reports, it comes at a time when British bookmakers are under pressure from tighter regulation.

As Kate King reports, it comes at a time when British bookmakers are under pressure from tighter regulation. //reut.rs/2L6JsTW
